getAll.description: Returns a list of forms based on the search filters. By default, it returns the first 20 hubspot forms.

get.description: Returns a form based on the form ID provided.

update.description: Update all fields of a hubspot form definition.

partialUpdate.description: Update some of the form definition components.

delete.description: Archive a form definition. New submissions will not be accepted and the form definition will be permanently deleted after 3 months.
